list.name: Worker Reschedule

targets.expr: group by (node) (kube_pod_info{pod="$worker",node!=""})
avg(DCGM_FI_DEV_SM_CLOCK{Hostname=~"$node"}*1000000)
avg(DCGM_FI_DEV_MEM_CLOCK{Hostname=~"$node"}*1000000)
sum by(gpu) (DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_UTIL{Hostname=~"$node", exported_pod=~"$worker"})
1e6*sum(DCGM_FI_DEV_NVLINK_BANDWIDTH_TOTAL{Hostname=~"$node", exported_pod=~"$worker"})
sum by(gpu) (DCGM_FI_DEV_MEM_COPY_UTIL{Hostname=~"$node", exported_pod=~"$worker"})
sum by(gpu) (DCGM_FI_DEV_POWER_USAGE{Hostname=~"$node", exported_pod=~"$worker"})
sum by(gpu) (DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{Hostname=~"$node", exported_pod=~"$worker"})
sum(DCGM_FI_PROF_PCIE_TX_BYTES{Hostname=~"$node", exported_pod=~"$worker"})
sum(DCGM_FI_PROF_PCIE_RX_BYTES{Hostname=~"$node", exported_pod=~"$worker"})

sum(
  rate(node_infiniband_port_data_transmitted_bytes_total{instance=~"$ip"}[$__interval])
  * on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
  * on(nodename) group_left(exported_pod) clamp(count by (nodename, hpc_job) (label_move(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{exported_pod=~"$worker"}, "Hostname", "nodename")), 1, 1)
)

sum(
  rate(node_infiniband_port_data_received_bytes_total{instance=~"$ip"}[$__interval])
  * on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
  * on(nodename) group_left(exported_pod) clamp(count by (nodename, hpc_job) (label_move(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{exported_pod=~"$worker"}, "Hostname", "nodename")), 1, 1)
)
sum by(gpu) (DCGM_FI_PROF_PIPE_TENSOR_ACTIVE{Hostname=~"$node", exported_pod=~"$worker"} * 100)
sum by(gpu) (DCGM_FI_PROF_PIPE_TENSOR_ACTIVE{Hostname=~"$node", exported_pod=~"$worker"} * 1979)
sum by(gpu) (DCGM_FI_PROF_PIPE_TENSOR_ACTIVE{Hostname=~"$node", exported_pod=~"$worker"} * 989.7)

matcher.options: Idle - Waiting for something to happen
Iowait - Waiting for I/O to complete
Nice - Niced processes executing in user mode
Steal - Time spent in other operating systems when running in a virtualized environment
System - Processes executing in kernel mode
User - Normal processes executing in user mode

targets.expr:
sum(
  irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=~"$ip", mode="system"}[$__rate_interval])
  * on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
  * on(nodename) group_left(exported_pod) clamp(count by (nodename, hpc_job) (label_move(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{exported_pod=~"$worker"}, "Hostname", "nodename")), 1, 1)
) / scalar(count(count(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=~"$ip"}) by (cpu)))
targets.legendFormat: System - Processes executing in kernel mode

targets.expr:
sum(
  irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=~"$ip", mode="user"}[$__rate_interval])
  * on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
  * on(nodename) group_left(exported_pod) clamp(count by (nodename, hpc_job) (label_move(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{exported_pod=~"$worker"}, "Hostname", "nodename")), 1, 1)
) / scalar(count(count(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=~"$ip"}) by (cpu)))
targets.legendFormat: User - Normal processes executing in user mode

targets.expr:
sum(
  irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=~"$ip", mode="nice"}[$__rate_interval])
  * on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
  * on(nodename) group_left(exported_pod) clamp(count by (nodename, hpc_job) (label_move(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{exported_pod=~"$worker"}, "Hostname", "nodename")), 1, 1)
) / scalar(count(count(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=~"$ip"}) by (cpu)))
targets.legendFormat: Nice - Niced processes executing in user mode

targets.expr:
sum(
  irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=~"$ip", mode="iowait"}[$__rate_interval])
  * on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
  * on(nodename) group_left(exported_pod) clamp(count by (nodename, hpc_job) (label_move(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{exported_pod=~"$worker"}, "Hostname", "nodename")), 1, 1)
) / scalar(count(count(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=~"$ip"}) by (cpu)))
targets.legendFormat: Iowait - Waiting for I/O to complete

targets.expr:
sum(
  irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=~"$ip", mode="irq"}[$__rate_interval])
  * on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
  * on(nodename) group_left(exported_pod) clamp(count by (nodename, hpc_job) (label_move(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{exported_pod=~"$worker"}, "Hostname", "nodename")), 1, 1)
) / scalar(count(count(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=~"$ip"}) by (cpu)))

sum(
  irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=~"$ip", mode="softirq"}[$__rate_interval])
  * on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
  * on(nodename) group_left(exported_pod) clamp(count by (nodename, hpc_job) (label_move(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{exported_pod=~"$worker"}, "Hostname", "nodename")), 1, 1)
) / scalar(count(count(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=~"$ip"}) by (cpu)))

sum(
  irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=~"$ip", mode="steal"}[$__rate_interval])
  * on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
  * on(nodename) group_left(exported_pod) clamp(count by (nodename, hpc_job) (label_move(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{exported_pod=~"$worker"}, "Hostname", "nodename")), 1, 1)
) / scalar(count(count(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=~"$ip"}) by (cpu)))
targets.legendFormat: Steal - Time spent in other operating systems when running in a virtualized environment

targets.expr:
sum(
  irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=~"$ip", mode="idle"}[$__rate_interval])
  * on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
  * on(nodename) group_left(exported_pod) clamp(count by (nodename, hpc_job) (label_move(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{exported_pod=~"$worker"}, "Hostname", "nodename")), 1, 1)
) / scalar(count(count(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=~"$ip"}) by (cpu)))
targets.legendFormat: Idle - Waiting for something to happen

matcher.options: Hardware Corrupted - Amount of RAM that the kernel identified as corrupted / not working

targets.expr:
(node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{instance=~"$ip"} - node_memory_MemFree_bytes{instance=~"$ip"} - node_memory_Buffers_bytes{instance=~"$ip"} - node_memory_Cached_bytes{instance=~"$ip"} - node_memory_Slab_bytes{instance=~"$ip"} - node_memory_PageTables_bytes{instance=~"$ip"} - node_memory_SwapCached_bytes{instance=~"$ip"})
* on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
* on(nodename) group_left(exported_pod) clamp(count by (nodename, exported_pod) (label_move(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{exported_pod=~"$worker"}, "Hostname", "nodename")), 1, 1)
targets.legendFormat: Apps - Memory used by user-space applications
PageTables - Memory used to map between virtual and physical memory addresses
SwapCache - Memory that keeps track of pages that have been fetched from swap but not yet been modified
Slab - Memory used by the kernel to cache data structures for its own use (caches like inode, dentry, etc)
Cache - Parked file data (file content) cache

targets.expr:
(node_memory_SwapTotal_bytes{instance=~"$ip"} - node_memory_SwapFree_bytes{instance=~"$ip"})
* on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
* on(nodename) group_left(exported_pod) clamp(count by (nodename, exported_pod) (label_move(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{exported_pod=~"$worker"}, "Hostname", "nodename")), 1, 1)

targets.legendFormat: Hardware Corrupted - Amount of RAM that the kernel identified as corrupted / not working

targets.expr:
irate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{instance=~"$ip"}[$__rate_interval])*8
* on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
* on(nodename) group_left(exported_pod) clamp(count by (nodename, exported_pod) (label_move(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{exported_pod=~"$worker"}, "Hostname", "nodename")), 1, 1)

irate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{instance=~"$ip"}[$__rate_interval])*8
* on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
* on(nodename) group_left(exported_pod) clamp(count by (nodename, exported_pod) (label_move(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{exported_pod=~"$worker"}, "Hostname", "nodename")), 1, 1)

(node_filesystem_size_bytes{instance=~"$ip",device!~'rootfs'} - node_filesystem_avail_bytes{instance=~"$ip",device!~'rootfs'})
* on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
* on(nodename) group_left(exported_pod) clamp(count by (nodename, exported_pod) (label_move(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{exported_pod=~"$worker"}, "Hostname", "nodename")), 1, 1)

irate(node_disk_reads_completed_total{instance=~"$ip",device=~"$diskdevices"}[$__rate_interval])
* on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
* on(nodename) group_left(exported_pod) clamp(count by (nodename, exported_pod) (label_move(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{exported_pod=~"$worker"}, "Hostname", "nodename")), 1, 1)

irate(node_disk_writes_completed_total{instance=~"$ip",device=~"$diskdevices"}[$__rate_interval])
* on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
* on(nodename) group_left(exported_pod) clamp(count by (nodename, exported_pod) (label_move(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{exported_pod=~"$worker"}, "Hostname", "nodename")), 1, 1)

irate(node_disk_read_bytes_total{instance=~"$ip",device=~"$diskdevices"}[$__rate_interval])
* on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
* on(nodename) group_left(exported_pod) clamp(count by (nodename, exported_pod) (label_move(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{exported_pod=~"$worker"}, "Hostname", "nodename")), 1, 1)

irate(node_disk_written_bytes_total{instance=~"$ip",device=~"$diskdevices"}[$__rate_interval])
* on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
* on(nodename) group_left(exported_pod) clamp(count by (nodename, exported_pod) (label_move(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{exported_pod=~"$worker"}, "Hostname", "nodename")), 1, 1)

irate(node_disk_io_time_seconds_total{instance=~"$ip",device=~"$diskdevices"} [$__rate_interval])
* on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
* on(nodename) group_left(exported_pod) clamp(count by (nodename, exported_pod) (label_move(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{exported_pod=~"$worker"}, "Hostname", "nodename")), 1, 1)
sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_guest_seconds_total{instance=~"$ip", mode="user"}[1m])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=~"$ip"}[1m])))
targets.legendFormat: Guest - Time spent running a virtual CPU for a guest operating system

targets.expr: sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_guest_seconds_total{instance=~"$ip", mode="nice"}[1m])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=~"$ip"}[1m])))
targets.legendFormat: GuestNice - Time spent running a niced guest  (virtual CPU for guest operating system)

matcher.options: Hardware Corrupted - Amount of RAM that the kernel identified as corrupted / not working

targets.legendFormat: Inactive - Memory which has been less recently used.  It is more eligible to be reclaimed for other purposes
Active - Memory that has been used more recently and usually not reclaimed unless absolutely necessary

matcher.options: Hardware Corrupted - Amount of RAM that the kernel identified as corrupted / not working

targets.legendFormat: Committed_AS - Amount of memory presently allocated on the system
CommitLimit - Amount of  memory currently available to be allocated on the system

matcher.options: Hardware Corrupted - Amount of RAM that the kernel identified as corrupted / not working

targets.legendFormat: Inactive_file - File-backed memory on inactive LRU list
Inactive_anon - Anonymous and swap cache on inactive LRU list, including tmpfs (shmem)
Active_file - File-backed memory on active LRU list
Active_anon - Anonymous and swap cache on active least-recently-used (LRU) list, including tmpfs
Writeback - Memory which is actively being written back to disk
WritebackTmp - Memory used by FUSE for temporary writeback buffers
Dirty - Memory which is waiting to get written back to the disk

matcher.options: Hardware Corrupted - Amount of RAM that the kernel identified as corrupted / not working
ShmemHugePages - Memory used by shared memory (shmem) and tmpfs allocated  with huge pages
ShmemHugePages - Memory used by shared memory (shmem) and tmpfs allocated  with huge pages

targets.legendFormat: Mapped - Used memory in mapped pages files which have been mapped, such as libraries
Shmem - Used shared memory (shared between several processes, thus including RAM disks)
ShmemHugePages - Memory used by shared memory (shmem) and tmpfs allocated  with huge pages
ShmemPmdMapped - Amount of shared (shmem/tmpfs) memory backed by huge pages

matcher.options: Hardware Corrupted - Amount of RAM that the kernel identified as corrupted / not working

targets.legendFormat: KernelStack - Kernel memory stack. This is not reclaimable
PerCPU - Per CPU memory allocated dynamically by loadable modules
VmallocChunk - Largest contiguous block of vmalloc area which is free
VmallocTotal - Total size of vmalloc memory area
VmallocUsed - Amount of vmalloc area which is used
AnonHugePages - Memory in anonymous huge pages
AnonPages - Memory in user pages not backed by files
NFS Unstable - Memory in NFS pages sent to the server, but not yet committed to the storage

targets.expr:
irate(node_vmstat_oom_kill{instance=~"$ip"}[$__rate_interval])
* on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
* on(nodename) group_left(exported_pod) clamp(count by (nodename, exported_pod) (label_move(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{exported_pod=~"$worker"}, "Hostname", "nodename")), 1, 1)

irate(node_vmstat_pgpgin{instance=~"$ip"}[$__rate_interval])
* on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
* on(nodename) group_left(exported_pod) clamp(count by (nodename, exported_pod) (label_move(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{exported_pod=~"$worker"}, "Hostname", "nodename")), 1, 1)

irate(node_vmstat_pgpgout{instance=~"$ip"}[$__rate_interval])
* on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
* on(nodename) group_left(exported_pod) clamp(count by (nodename, exported_pod) (label_move(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{exported_pod=~"$worker"}, "Hostname", "nodename")), 1, 1)

matcher.options: Hardware Corrupted - Amount of RAM that the kernel identified as corrupted / not working
Pgfault - Page major and minor fault operations

targets.expr:
irate(node_vmstat_pgfault{instance=~"$ip"}[$__rate_interval])
* on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
* on(nodename) group_left(exported_pod) clamp(count by (nodename, exported_pod) (label_move(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{exported_pod=~"$worker"}, "Hostname", "nodename")), 1, 1)
targets.legendFormat: Pgfault - Page major and minor fault operations

targets.expr:
irate(node_vmstat_pgmajfault{instance=~"$ip"}[$__rate_interval])
* on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
* on(nodename) group_left(exported_pod) clamp(count by (nodename, exported_pod) (label_move(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{exported_pod=~"$worker"}, "Hostname", "nodename")), 1, 1)

irate(node_vmstat_pgfault{instance=~"$ip"}[$__rate_interval])  - irate(node_vmstat_pgmajfault{instance=~"$ip"}[$__rate_interval])
* on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
* on(nodename) group_left(exported_pod) clamp(count by (nodename, exported_pod) (label_move(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{exported_pod=~"$worker"}, "Hostname", "nodename")), 1, 1)

panels.description: The number (after merges) of I/O requests completed per second for the device

targets.expr:
irate(node_disk_reads_completed_total{instance=~"$ip"}[$__rate_interval])
* on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
* on(nodename) group_left(exported_pod) clamp(count by (nodename, exported_pod) (label_move(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{exported_pod=~"$worker"}, "Hostname", "nodename")), 1, 1)

irate(node_disk_writes_completed_total{instance=~"$ip"}[$__rate_interval])
* on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
* on(nodename) group_left(exported_pod) clamp(count by (nodename, exported_pod) (label_move(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{exported_pod=~"$worker"}, "Hostname", "nodename")), 1, 1)

panels.title: Disk IOps Completed

panels.description: The number of bytes read from or written to the device per second

targets.expr:
irate(node_disk_read_bytes_total{instance=~"$ip"}[$__rate_interval])
* on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
* on(nodename) group_left(exported_pod) clamp(count by (nodename, exported_pod) (label_move(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{exported_pod=~"$worker"}, "Hostname", "nodename")), 1, 1)

irate(node_disk_written_bytes_total{instance=~"$ip"}[$__rate_interval])
* on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
* on(nodename) group_left(exported_pod) clamp(count by (nodename, exported_pod) (label_move(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{exported_pod=~"$worker"}, "Hostname", "nodename")), 1, 1)

panels.title: Disk R/W Data

panels.description: The average time for requests issued to the device to be served. This includes the time spent by the requests in queue and the time spent servicing them.

targets.expr:
irate(node_disk_read_time_seconds_total{instance=~"$ip"}[$__rate_interval]) / irate(node_disk_reads_completed_total{instance=~"$ip"}[$__rate_interval])
* on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
* on(nodename) group_left(exported_pod) clamp(count by (nodename, exported_pod) (label_move(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{exported_pod=~"$worker"}, "Hostname", "nodename")), 1, 1)

irate(node_disk_write_time_seconds_total{instance=~"$ip"}[$__rate_interval]) / irate(node_disk_writes_completed_total{instance=~"$ip"}[$__rate_interval])
* on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
* on(nodename) group_left(exported_pod) clamp(count by (nodename, exported_pod) (label_move(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{exported_pod=~"$worker"}, "Hostname", "nodename")), 1, 1)

panels.title: Disk Average Wait Time

panels.description: The average queue length of the requests that were issued to the device

targets.expr:
irate(node_disk_io_time_weighted_seconds_total{instance=~"$ip"}[$__rate_interval])
* on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
* on(nodename) group_left(exported_pod) clamp(count by (nodename, exported_pod) (label_move(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{exported_pod=~"$worker"}, "Hostname", "nodename")), 1, 1)

panels.title: Average Queue Size

panels.description: The number of read and write requests merged per second that were queued to the device

targets.expr:
irate(node_disk_reads_merged_total{instance=~"$ip"}[$__rate_interval])
* on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
* on(nodename) group_left(exported_pod) clamp(count by (nodename, exported_pod) (label_move(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{exported_pod=~"$worker"}, "Hostname", "nodename")), 1, 1)

irate(node_disk_writes_merged_total{instance=~"$ip"}[$__rate_interval])
* on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
* on(nodename) group_left(exported_pod) clamp(count by (nodename, exported_pod) (label_move(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{exported_pod=~"$worker"}, "Hostname", "nodename")), 1, 1)

panels.title: Disk R/W Merged

panels.description: Percentage of elapsed time during which I/O requests were issued to the device (bandwidth utilization for the device). Device saturation occurs when this value is close to 100% for devices serving requests serially.  But for devices  serving requests in parallel, such as RAID arrays and modern SSDs, this number does not reflect their performance limits.

targets.expr:
irate(node_disk_io_time_seconds_total{instance=~"$ip"}[$__rate_interval])
* on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
* on(nodename) group_left(exported_pod) clamp(count by (nodename, exported_pod) (label_move(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{exported_pod=~"$worker"}, "Hostname", "nodename")), 1, 1)

irate(node_disk_discard_time_seconds_total{instance=~"$ip"}[$__rate_interval])
* on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
* on(nodename) group_left(exported_pod) clamp(count by (nodename, exported_pod) (label_move(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{exported_pod=~"$worker"}, "Hostname", "nodename")), 1, 1)

panels.title: Time Spent Doing I/Os

panels.description: The number of outstanding requests at the instant the sample was taken. Incremented as requests are given to appropriate struct request_queue and decremented as they finish.
panels.title: Instantaneous Queue Size

* on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
* on(nodename) group_left(exported_pod) clamp(count by (nodename, exported_pod) (label_move(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{exported_pod=~"$worker"}, "Hostname", "nodename")), 1, 1)

irate(node_netstat_Udp_InDatagrams{instance=~"$ip"}[$__rate_interval])
* on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
* on(nodename) group_left(exported_pod) clamp(count by (nodename, exported_pod) (label_move(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{exported_pod=~"$worker"}, "Hostname", "nodename")), 1, 1)

* on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info

targets.legendFormat: OutSegs - Segments sent, including those on current connections but excluding those containing only retransmitted octets

targets.expr:
irate(node_netstat_TcpExt_TCPOFOQueue{instance=~"$ip"}[$__rate_interval])
* on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info

targets.legendFormat: TCPOFOQueue - TCP layer receives an out of order packet and has enough memory to queue it
CurrEstab - TCP connections for which the current state is either ESTABLISHED or CLOSE- WAIT
MaxConn - Limit on the total number of TCP connections the entity can support (Dynamic is "-1")

targets.expr:
